ygData.subject: Re: [neat] NEAT with Unity3d ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, What version of Mono are you using? My understanding is that parallel extensions were added to version 2.6:

Hi,

What version of Mono are you using? My understanding is that parallel
extensions were added to version 2.6:

    http://www.mono-project.com/Release_Notes_Mono_2.6

"This release includes some components of the ParallelFx framework
that were developed as part of Google Summer Of Code 2008 & 2009. More
precisely, it contains the Task Parallel Library and Data Structures
For Coordination."
[...]
"To use this code you have to manually enable the .NET 4 profile using
the --with-profile4=yes switch at configure stage."

So potentially you just need to enable the .Net 4 profile.

Wesley's option is a good fall-back option if that doesn't work.
Either way you should be able to get the latest SharpNEAT working on
Mono, I believe I tested it on mono using the preliminary parallel
extensions code they released back in 2008.

Regards,

Colin.
